channel.title: Existing Mod "slowItDown"
channel.description:
Hi all I hope the Programmer could read this or some how know the programmer xDaris for the mod.
if ist possible it would be nice to add a feature to the lovely toggler: currently its flowing items when the toggel is empty and stop when its full. may be it would be nice to make a negativ button. thats means the throttle is closed by Default and will open if the toggel say belt is full (and not by if its empty):
example by a big storage handling to Prevent a storage to over flow and block a mixed incoming belt before.
thanks in advance

item.title: Existing Mod "slowItDown"
item.dc:creator: @shubnigg Shubnigg
item.description:
@shubnigg wrote:

Use the Programmable Splitter and use the overflow option in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Existing Mod "slowItDown"

item.description:
@Shorty66666 wrote:

Hi all
I hope the Programmer could read this or some how know the programmer xDaris for the mod.

if ist possible it would be nice to add a feature to the lovely toggler:
currently its flowing items when the toggel is empty and stop when its full.
may be it would be nice to make a negativ button.
thats means the throttle is closed by Default and will open if the toggel say belt is full (and not by if its empty):

example by a big storage handling to Prevent a storage to over flow and block a mixed incoming belt before.
